```{r include = FALSE}
library('viridis')
library('ggplot2')
library('stargazer')
```

The code below demonstrates two color palettes in the [viridis](https://github.com/sjmgarnier/viridis) package. Each plot displays a contour map of the Maunga Whau volcano in Auckland, New Zealand. ė

## Viridis colors

```{r}
image(volcano, col = viridis(200))
```

## Magma colors

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=4, echo=TRUE, dev='cairo_pdf'}
qplot(mpg, wt, data=mtcars) +
  labs(title="Title ą")
```

```{r results = "asis"}
stargazer::stargazer(head(mtcars[,1:2]), 
          title = "Table pavadinimas",
          summary = TRUE,
          rownames = FALSE,
          header = FALSE)
```
